name: Timelapse Full Flight | London Heathrow to Oslo | British Airways Airbus A319
description:
A timelapse flight from London Heathrow to Oslo onboard British Airways Airbus A319 G-EUPO operating flight BA762 on 12 September 2015.

***PLEASE SUBSCRIBE, LIKE, COMMENT, AND FOLLOW ME ON FACEBOOK, TWITTER, GOOGLE+ AND INSTAGRAM!!***

After a lengthy taxi, we take off on runway 27L at Heathrow and head out across East Anglia into the North Sea, passing to the north of Denmark before crossing the Norwegian coast and commencing our descent towards Gardermoen.  We make a smooth landing under cloudy skies onto runway 01R at Oslo, and taxi into our gate.

Airline:  British Airways
Flight:  BA762
Aircraft:  Airbus A319 G-EUPO
From:  London - Heathrow (LHR)
To:  Oslo - Gardermoen (OSL)
Departure:  08:27
Arrival:  11:03
Flight Time:  01:36
Seat:  17A
Flight Path:  http://goo.gl/43o4yQ

Video taken from seat 17A.

***PLEASE SUBSCRIBE, LIKE, COMMENT, AND FOLLOW ME ON FACEBOOK, TWITTER, GOOGLE+ AND INSTAGRAM!!***

✈ ✈

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
